title: ☀Feeling the Heat?☀ Come Cool Off Here.🌊🌊🌊
posting_body: Thank you for your interest in Willow Creek Apartments!
We offer cozy 1- & 2-bedroom apartments and spacious 2-bedroom townhomes.
I have included all information that will be helpful.
I have also included the application if your interests meet what we have available!
Click the Link for 2 Bedroom apartment tour.
2-bedroom, 1 bath apartment home – $1100.00      Available in August
Gas, heat, water, sewer and trash are included in the rent!!
*Application fees are $35 per adult, must move within 2 weeks of approval
*A $100.00 deposit is due with the application.
(The deposit is refundable if the application is not approved)
When applying please provide 4 recent paystubs, photo ID, and social security card.

***In order to qualify for an apartment home, you will need to show that you gross a minimum of 3x the monthly rent; have more positive credit than negative; no prior evictions or monies owed to a prior landlord; we do process a background screen.
See attachments for the application packet
We are available to answer any questions
I look forward to hearing from you!
